Obtaining a Licence

# Motorcycle (6A, 6B, 6C) and 3-Wheel (6E)

To obtain a Class 6A, 6B or 6C motorcycle driver's licence, you have to pass a knowledge test, take a course, and pass 2 road tests.

To obtain a Class 6E licence, which authorizes you to ride 3-wheel motorcycles, you must hold a Class 5 licence and complete a one-day training course.

Last update: July 16, 2025
